description:
Want to learn how to absorb knowledge like a sponge and recall information quickly and easily?

Based on neuroscience and how the brain works, Australian presenter, Nina Sunday, shows you how to cultivate a high performing memory and remember information like a genius

Now you can access more of the vast 'untapped potential' lying dormant within. We'll teach you step-by-step how to cultivate a super memory. Invest in training your brainpower.

Here's a sample of the knowledge and skills you'll master in the Super Memory online course:

  • the secrets of Memory Improvement, to build a super memory and effortlessly recall information
  • the three laws of memory
  • memory hooks to help remember information, quickly and easily
  • optimal time to work at a desk or study in one sitting; any longer and the brain 'leaks' information like a sieve
  • how to use colour in notetaking to vividly recall detailed information
  • how to remember numbers
  • how exercise aids memory

Retrieving will never be a problem again!

Don't just take our word for it.

'My brain now works like a new brain. I am more focused and work smarter.'Jane Tumbri, Human Resources Manager, Cognos

'User-friendly course. I am more confident using my memory more efficiently.'Pina Carrabs, Customer Service Manager, UPS

Lectures:

  1. Introduction
  2. Memory game - Primacy, Recency, Von Restorff Effect
  3. Memory hooks
  4. Attention span
  5. Rule of seven
  6. Curve of forgetting
  7. How to remember numbers
  8. Review
  9. Why exercise aids memory
title: Super Memory For Students: How To Remember What You Study
